label: Antiperspirants and Deodorants
description: Products that help control sweat and odor in the underarm area.
intents: Find natural alternatives to traditional antiperspirants

subcategories.label: Aluminum-Free
subcategories.description: Antiperspirants and deodorants that do not contain aluminum.

subcategories.label: Clinical Strength
subcategories.description: Antiperspirants that provide extra strength protection against sweat and odor.

subcategories.label: Men's

subcategories.label: Women's
subcategories.description: Antiperspirants and deodorants designed specifically for women.
